price: Kisha bila ya shaka mtagombana Siku ya Kiyama mbele ya Mola wenu Mlezi.
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ عِندَ رَبِّكُمۡ تَخۡتَصِمُونَ
footnotes: Kisha baada ya kufa kwenu mtafufuliwa mbele ya Mwenyezi Mungu mkishitakiana nyinyi kwa nyinyi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: thumma innakum yawma al-qiyāmati ʿinda rabbikum takhtaṣimūna
